title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, there is an issue with the 'Close All Saved' functionality.
OB: After creating a new file f1.txt and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, not all the saved editors are getting closed.
EB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all the saved editors should be closed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 
2. Open multiple editors.
3. Create a new file f1.txt.
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
5. Verify if all the saved editors are closed.
